#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Function
#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
function(qwt_add_example NAME)
    set(multiValueArgs SOURCES)
    cmake_parse_arguments(arg "" "" "${multiValueArgs}" "${ARGN}")
    add_executable(${NAME} ${arg_SOURCES})
    target_link_libraries(${NAME} PRIVATE Qwt)
endfunction()
